member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.Web.SeriLogExtensions.SetupConsoleLogging(IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.Web.CoreWebStartup,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Sets up Console Logging only, leverages SeriLog sinks

member.name: T:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.Web.StartupExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to setup logging on NRSRx framework

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.Web.StartupExtensions.SetupElasticsearch(IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.Web.CoreWebStartup,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Sets up the asp.net core application to log to a Elasticsearch instance. Refernce: https://github.com/serilog/serilog-sinks-elasticsearch/wiki/basic-setup Note: The following configuration variables are required: ELASTICSEARCH_HOST => The url of the Elasticsearch endpoint (ie: http(s)://{Elasticsearch Host}/9200)
